verses.verse: וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> now these הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <S%H3548><s%> Now these [are] the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who עָל֛וּ <S%H5927><s%> that went up עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with זְרֻבָּבֶ֥ל <S%H2216><s%> with Zerubbabel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵ֖ל <S%H7597><s%> of Shealtiel וְיֵשׁ֑וּעַ <S%H3442><s%> and Jeshua שְׂרָיָ֥ה <S%H8304><s%> Seraiah יִרְמְיָ֖ה <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah עֶזְרָֽא׃ <S%H5830><s%> Ezra
אֲמַרְיָ֥ה <S%H568><s%> Amariah מַלּ֖וּךְ <S%H4409><s%> Malluch חַטּֽוּשׁ׃ <S%H2407><s%> Hattush
שְׁכַנְיָ֥ה <S%H7935><s%> Shechaniah רְחֻ֖ם <S%H7348><s%> Rehum מְרֵמֹֽת׃ <S%H4822><s%> Meremoth
עִדּ֥וֹא <S%H5714><s%> Iddo גִנְּת֖וֹי <S%H1599><s%> Ginnetho אֲבִיָּֽה׃ <S%H29><s%> Abijah
מִיָּמִ֥ין <S%H4326><s%> Miamin מַֽעַדְיָ֖ה <S%H4573><s%> Maadiah בִּלְגָּֽה׃ <S%H1083><s%> Bilgah
שְׁמַֽעְיָ֥ה <S%H8098><s%> Shemaiah וְיוֹיָרִ֖יב <S%H3114><s%> and Joiarib יְדַֽעְיָֽה׃ <S%H3048><s%> Jedaiah

סַלּ֣וּ <S%H5543><s%> Sallu עָמ֔וֹק <S%H5987><s%> Amok חִלְקִיָּ֖ה <S%H2518><s%> Hilkiah יְדַֽעְיָ֑ה <S%H3048><s%> Jedaiah אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These רָאשֵׁ֧י <S%H7218><s%> These [were] the chief הַכֹּהֲנִ֛ים <S%H3548><s%> of the priests וַאֲחֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H251><s%> and of their brethren בִּימֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> in the days יֵשֽׁוּעַ׃ <S%H3442><s%> of Jeshua פ

וְהַלְוִיִּ֗ם <S%H3881><s%> Moreover the Levites יֵשׁ֧וּעַ <S%H3442><s%> Jeshua בִּנּ֛וּי <S%H1131><s%> Binnui קַדְמִיאֵ֥ל <S%H6934><s%> Kadmiel שֵׁרֵבְיָ֖ה <S%H8274><s%> Sherebiah יְהוּדָ֣ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah מַתַּנְיָ֑ה <S%H4983><s%> [and] Mattaniah עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> charge הֻיְּד֖וֹת <S%H1960><s%> [which was] over the thanksgiving ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְאֶחָֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> he and his brethren

וּבַקְבֻּֽקְיָ֨ה <S%H1229><s%> Also Bakbukiah [וְעֻנֹּו כ] (וְעֻנִּ֧י <S%H6042><s%> Unni ק) אֲחֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H251><s%> their brethren לְנֶגְדָּ֖ם <S%H5048><s%> opposite לְמִשְׁמָרֽוֹת׃ <S%H4931><s%> [were] over against them in the watches

וְיֵשׁ֖וּעַ <S%H3442><s%> And Jeshua הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יֽוֹיָקִ֑ים <S%H3113><s%> Joiakim וְיֽוֹיָקִים֙ <S%H3113><s%> Joiakim הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> also begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶלְיָשִׁ֔יב <S%H475><s%> Eliashib וְאֶלְיָשִׁ֖יב <S%H475><s%> and Eliashib אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹיָדָֽע׃ <S%H3111><s%> Joiada

וְיוֹיָדָע֙ <S%H3111><s%> And Joiada הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹנָתָ֔ן <S%H3129><s%> Jonathan וְיוֹנָתָ֖ן <S%H3129><s%> and Jonathan הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יַדּֽוּעַ׃ <S%H3037><s%> Jaddua

וּבִימֵי֙ <S%H3117><s%> And in the days יֽוֹיָקִ֔ים <S%H3113><s%> of Joiakim הָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become כֹהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> were priests רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> the chief הָאָב֑וֹת <S%H1><s%> of the fathers לִשְׂרָיָ֣ה <S%H8304><s%> of Seraiah מְרָיָ֔ה <S%H4811><s%> Meraiah לְיִרְמְיָ֖ה <S%H3414><s%> of Jeremiah חֲנַנְיָֽה׃ <S%H2608><s%> Hananiah
לְעֶזְרָ֣א <S%H5830><s%> Of Ezra מְשֻׁלָּ֔ם <S%H4918><s%> Meshullam לַאֲמַרְיָ֖ה <S%H568><s%> of Amariah יְהוֹחָנָֽן׃ <S%H3076><s%> Jehohanan
[לִמְלוּכִי כ] (לִמְלִ֙יכוּ֙ <S%H4409><s%> Malluch ק) יֽוֹנָתָ֔ן <S%H3129><s%> Jonathan לִשְׁבַנְיָ֖ה <S%H7645><s%> of Shebaniah יוֹסֵֽף׃ <S%H3130><s%> Joseph
לְחָרִ֣ם <S%H2766><s%> Of Harim עַדְנָ֔א <S%H5733><s%> Adna לִמְרָי֖וֹת <S%H4812><s%> of Meraioth חֶלְקָֽי׃ <S%H2517><s%> Helkai
[לַעֲדָיָא כ] (לְעִדֹּ֥וא <S%H5714><s%> Iddo ק) זְכַרְיָ֖ה <S%H2148><s%> Zechariah לְגִנְּת֥וֹן <S%H1599><s%> of Ginnethon מְשֻׁלָּֽם׃ <S%H4918><s%> Meshullam
לַאֲבִיָּ֖ה <S%H29><s%> Of Abijah זִכְרִ֑י <S%H2147><s%> Zichri לְמִ֨נְיָמִ֔ין <S%H4509><s%> of Miniamin לְמוֹעַדְיָ֖ה <S%H4153><s%> of Moadiah פִּלְטָֽי׃ <S%H6408><s%> Piltai
לְבִלְגָּ֣ה <S%H1083><s%> Of Bilgah שַׁמּ֔וּעַ <S%H8051><s%> Shammua לִֽשְׁמַעְיָ֖ה <S%H8098><s%> of Shemaiah יְהוֹנָתָֽן׃ <S%H3083><s%> Jehonathan
וּלְיוֹיָרִ֣יב <S%H3114><s%> And of Joiarib מַתְּנַ֔י <S%H4982><s%> Mattenai לִֽידַֽעְיָ֖ה <S%H3048><s%> of Jedaiah עֻזִּֽי׃ <S%H5813><s%> Uzzi
לְסַלַּ֥י <S%H5543><s%> Of Sallai קַלָּ֖י <S%H7040><s%> Kallai לְעָמ֥וֹק <S%H5987><s%> of Amok עֵֽבֶר׃ <S%H5677><s%> Eber
לְחִלְקִיָּ֣ה <S%H2518><s%> Of Hilkiah חֲשַׁבְיָ֔ה <S%H2811><s%> Hashabiah לִֽידַֽעְיָ֖ה <S%H3048><s%> of Jedaiah נְתַנְאֵֽל׃ <S%H5417><s%> Nethaneel

הַלְוִיִּם֩ <S%H3881><s%> The Levites בִּימֵ֨י <S%H3117><s%> in the days אֶלְיָשִׁ֜יב <S%H475><s%> of Eliashib יוֹיָדָ֤ע <S%H3111><s%> Joiada וְיוֹחָנָן֙ <S%H3110><s%> and Johanan וְיַדּ֔וּעַ <S%H3037><s%> and Jaddua כְּתוּבִ֖ים <S%H3789><s%> [were] recorded רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> chief אָב֑וֹת <S%H1><s%> of the fathers וְהַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> also the priests עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in מַלְכ֖וּת <S%H4438><s%> to the reign דָּרְיָ֥וֶשׁ <S%H1867><s%> of Darius הַפָּֽרְסִֽי׃ <S%H6542><s%> the Persian פ

בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> The sons לֵוִי֙ <S%H3878><s%> of Levi רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> the chief הָֽאָב֔וֹת <S%H1><s%> of the fathers כְּתוּבִ֕ים <S%H3789><s%> [were] written עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in סֵ֖פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in the book דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> of the chronicles הַיָּמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> even until the days וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> up יְמֵ֖י <S%H3117><s%> to the days יֽוֹחָנָ֥ן <S%H3110><s%> of Johanan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֶלְיָשִֽׁיב׃ <S%H475><s%> of Eliashib

וְרָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> And the chief הַ֠לְוִיִּם <S%H3881><s%> of the Levites חֲשַׁבְיָ֨ה <S%H2811><s%> Hashabiah שֵֽׁרֵבְיָ֜ה <S%H8274><s%> Sherebiah וְיֵשׁ֤וּעַ <S%H3442><s%> and Jeshua בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son קַדְמִיאֵל֙ <S%H6934><s%> of Kadmiel וַאֲחֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H251><s%> with their brethren לְנֶגְדָּ֔ם <S%H5048><s%> opposite לְהַלֵּ֣ל <S%H1984><s%> over against them to praise לְהוֹד֔וֹת <S%H3034><s%> [and] to give thanks בְּמִצְוַ֖ת <S%H4687><s%> according to the commandment דָּוִ֣יד <S%H1732><s%> of David אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> the man הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God מִשְׁמָ֖ר <S%H4929><s%> ward לְעֻמַּ֥ת <S%H5980><s%> over against מִשְׁמָֽר׃ <S%H4929><s%> ward

מַתַּנְיָ֧ה <S%H4983><s%> Mattaniah וּבַקְבֻּֽקְיָ֛ה <S%H1229><s%> and Bakbukiah עֹבַדְיָ֥ה <S%H5662><s%> Obadiah מְשֻׁלָּ֖ם <S%H4918><s%> Meshullam טַלְמ֣וֹן <S%H2929><s%> Talmon עַקּ֑וּב <S%H6126><s%> Akkub שֹׁמְרִ֤ים <S%H8104><s%> keeping שֽׁוֹעֲרִים֙ <S%H7778><s%> [were] porters מִשְׁמָ֔ר <S%H4929><s%> the ward בַּאֲסֻפֵּ֖י <S%H624><s%> at the thresholds הַשְּׁעָרִֽים׃ <S%H8179><s%> of the gates

אֵ֕לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These בִּימֵ֛י <S%H3117><s%> These [were] in the days יוֹיָקִ֥ים <S%H3113><s%> of Joiakim בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יֵשׁ֖וּעַ <S%H3442><s%> of Jeshua בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יוֹצָדָ֑ק <S%H3136><s%> of Jozadak וּבִימֵי֙ <S%H3117><s%> and in the days נְחֶמְיָ֣ה <S%H5166><s%> of Nehemiah הַפֶּחָ֔ה <S%H6346><s%> the governor וְעֶזְרָ֥א <S%H5830><s%> and of Ezra הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest הַסּוֹפֵֽר׃ <S%H5608><s%> the scribe פ

וּבַחֲנֻכַּ֞ת <S%H2598><s%> And at the dedication חוֹמַ֣ת <S%H2346><s%> of the wall יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem בִּקְשׁ֤וּ <S%H1245><s%> they sought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַלְוִיִּם֙ <S%H3881><s%> the Levites מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מְק֣וֹמֹתָ֔ם <S%H4725><s%> out of all their places לַהֲבִיאָ֖ם <S%H935><s%> to bring לִֽירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> them to Jerusalem לַעֲשֹׂ֨ת <S%H6213><s%> to keep חֲנֻכָּ֤ה <S%H2598><s%> the dedication וְשִׂמְחָה֙ <S%H8057><s%> with gladness וּבְתוֹד֣וֹת <S%H8426><s%> both with thanksgivings וּבְשִׁ֔יר <S%H7892><s%> and with singing מְצִלְתַּ֖יִם <S%H4700><s%> [with] cymbals נְבָלִ֥ים <S%H5035><s%> psalteries וּבְכִנֹּרֽוֹת׃ <S%H3658><s%> and with harps

וַיֵּאָ֣סְפ֔וּ <S%H622><s%> gathered themselves together בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons הַמְשֹׁרְרִ֑ים <S%H7891><s%> of the singers וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַכִּכָּר֙ <S%H3603><s%> both out of the plain country סְבִיב֣וֹת <S%H5439><s%> round about יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> and from חַצְרֵ֖י <S%H2691><s%> and from the villages נְטֹפָתִֽי׃ <S%H5200><s%> of Netophathi

וּמִבֵּית֙ <S%H1004><s%> Also from the house הַגִּלְגָּ֔ל <S%H1537><s%> Gilgal וּמִשְּׂד֥וֹת <S%H7704><s%> and out of the fields גֶּ֖בַע <S%H1387><s%> of Geba וְעַזְמָ֑וֶת <S%H5820><s%> and Azmaveth כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> themselves חֲצֵרִ֗ים <S%H2691><s%> them villages בָּנ֤וּ <S%H1129><s%> had builded לָהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> for הַמְשֹׁ֣רֲרִ֔ים <S%H7891><s%> for the singers סְבִיב֖וֹת <S%H5439><s%> round about יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem

וַיִּֽטַּהֲר֔וּ <S%H2891><s%> purified הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> And the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֑ם <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites וַֽיְטַהֲרוּ֙ <S%H2891><s%> themselves and purified אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> the people וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשְּׁעָרִ֖ים <S%H8179><s%> and the gates וְאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחוֹמָֽה׃ <S%H2346><s%> and the wall

וָאַעֲלֶה֙ <S%H5927><s%> Then I brought up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> the princes יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> of לַחוֹמָ֑ה <S%H2346><s%> upon the wall וָאַעֲמִ֡ידָה <S%H5975><s%> and appointed שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> two תוֹדֹת֩ <S%H8426><s%> [companies of them that gave] thanks גְּדוֹלֹ֨ת <S%H1419><s%> great וְתַהֲלֻכֹ֤ת <S%H8418><s%> [whereof one] went לַיָּמִין֙ <S%H3225><s%> on the right hand מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> of לַחוֹמָ֔ה <S%H2346><s%> upon the wall לְשַׁ֖עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הָאַשְׁפֹּֽת׃ <S%H830><s%> toward the dung

וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> along אַחֲרֵיהֶם֙ <S%H310><s%> And after הוֹשַׁ֣עְיָ֔ה <S%H1955><s%> Hoshaiah וַחֲצִ֖י <S%H2677><s%> and half שָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> of the princes יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah
וַעֲזַרְיָ֥ה <S%H5838><s%> And Azariah עֶזְרָ֖א <S%H5830><s%> Ezra וּמְשֻׁלָּֽם׃ <S%H4918><s%> and Meshullam
יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> Judah וּבִנְיָמִ֔ן <S%H1144><s%> and Benjamin וּֽשְׁמַֽעְיָ֖ה <S%H8098><s%> and Shemaiah וְיִרְמְיָֽה׃ <S%H3414><s%> and Jeremiah ס

וּמִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> sons הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> And [certain] of the priests' בַּחֲצֹצְר֑וֹת <S%H2689><s%> with trumpets זְכַרְיָ֨ה <S%H2148><s%> [namely] Zechariah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יֽוֹנָתָ֜ן <S%H3129><s%> of Jonathan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שְׁמַֽעְיָ֗ה <S%H8098><s%> of Shemaiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מַתַּנְיָה֙ <S%H4983><s%> of Mattaniah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מִ֣יכָיָ֔ה <S%H4320><s%> of Michaiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son זַכּ֖וּר <S%H2139><s%> of Zaccur בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אָסָֽף׃ <S%H623><s%> of Asaph
